labels.name: story
labels.value: Story Name: Verify XE Application is opening

name: Verify the XE Currency Conversion Application Launched
description: Test Description: Verify the XE Currency Conversion Application default langing page is ConvertTab

steps.name: Wait for XE Application page is getting opened

attachments.name:
Found Element By : By.xpath: //div[contains(@class, 'hero-container__HeadingContainer') and ./h1[contains(.,"The World's Trusted Currency Authority")]], ScreenName: HomePage, ElementText (or) Name: The World's Trusted Currency Authority
Check exchange rates, send money internationally, and free currency tools

steps.name: Wait for convert tab to be visible

attachments.name: Found Element By : By.xpath: //input[@id='amount'], ScreenName: ConvertTab, ElementText (or) Name:
Assertion success: XE Conversion home page should be loaded --> Expected is [true] and Actual is [true]
Assertion success: Covert Tab should be the default the tab in home page --> Expected is [true] and Actual is [true]
